card.name: Noellecoaster
card.description: Has +1 {{COST}} in hand for each spell you cast (min 2 {{GOLD}}). {{KW:MAGIC}}: Gain {{STATS:+1|+1}} for each and look at 2 spells with equal {{COST}}. Cast one on the monster in front.
